title: Angkor Temple Discovery
description: Professional Angkor temple experience at $35 per person, per day. Choose 1 day for highlights or 2 days for complete discovery.
detailedDescription: Experience the magnificent Angkor Archaeological Park at your own pace. Choose 1 day for essential highlights or 2 days for comprehensive exploration. This professionally guided tour combines must-see iconic temples with atmospheric ruins and serene locations.

1day.title: 1-Day Highlights Tour
1day.description: Perfect introduction covering the most iconic temples including sunrise at Angkor Wat

2day.priceDisplay: $35 per person, per day (2 days = $70 per person)
2day.title: 2-Day Complete Discovery
2day.description: Comprehensive exploration of all major temples plus hidden gems and artistic masterpieces

schedule.description: Witness the breathtaking sunrise over the world's largest religious monument
Explore the intricate bas-reliefs and architectural marvels with expert commentary

schedule.note: Own expense - authentic Khmer cuisine available

schedule.description: Marvel at the famous smiling faces of Avalokiteshvara in Angkor Thom
Explore the atmospheric jungle temple featured in Tomb Raider movie

Explore the vast and atmospheric ruins of this former monastery and university

schedule.note: Own expense - traditional Cambodian dishes available
